title: Pan (monster)
data:
***Obsolete**: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.*

*This page is about the [unique](/Unique "Unique") [monster](/Monster "Monster"). For the dungeon branch, see [Pandemonium](/Pandemonium "Pandemonium").*For a list of all centaur-type creatures, see [list of centaurs](/List_of_centaurs "List of centaurs").

|   |                                                                                                             |
| - | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | The lord of all satyrs. With his flute, he produces music said to cloud the mind beyond all hope of return. |

| Pan c [![Pan.png](/images/c/ca/Pan.png)](/File:Pan.png)      |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| ------------------------------------------------------------ | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |

| [Will](/Willpower "Willpower")                               | 72                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |

| Flags                                                        | [Actual spells](/Actual_spells "Actual spells") [Speaks](/Speaks "Speaks") [Unique](/Unique_monster "Unique monster") [Archer](/Category:Archer_flag "Category:Archer flag") [Spellcaster](/Spellcaster "Spellcaster") [Warm-blooded](/Blood_temperature "Blood temperature") |

## Useful Info

**Pan** was a [unique](/Unique "Unique") [satyr](/Satyr "Satyr") who was never included in a stable release of *Crawl*. He was intended to roam the [Enchanted Forest](/Enchanted_Forest "Enchanted Forest") with a band of satyrs and [fauns](/Faun "Faun"), disabling you with powerful [Hexes](/Hexes "Hexes") while his allies riddled you with [arrows](/Arrow "Arrow") and [sling bullets](/Sling_bullet "Sling bullet").

## Spells

| Spell set |                                                                            |
| :-------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1     | *none*                                                                     |
| Slot2     | [Mass Confusion](/Mass_Confusion "Mass Confusion")                         |
| Slot3     | *none*                                                                     |
| Slot4     | [Metabolic Englaciation](/Metabolic_Englaciation "Metabolic Englaciation") |
| Slot5     | [Sleep](/Sleep "Sleep")                                                    |
| Slot6     | [Blink](/Blink "Blink")                                                    |

## History

Pan was a unique that existed in [trunk](/Trunk "Trunk") for a very brief period of time. He was originally intended to be included in [0.13](/0.13 "0.13"), but was disabled shortly after his introduction, and removed not long thereafter.
html:
Pan (monster)

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Obsolete: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.

This page is about the unique monster. For the dungeon branch, see Pandemonium.
 For a list of all centaur-type creatures, see list of centaurs.

The lord of all satyrs. With his flute, he produces music said to cloud the mind beyond all hope of return.
Pan c 
HP 240
HD 18
XP 6455
Speed 10
AC 3
EV 25
Will 72
Attack1 35 (hit: plain)


Resistances None
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Land
Intelligence High
Uses Weapons & armour
Starting equipment
Open doors
Holiness Natural
Size Medium
Type satyr, satyr
Flags Actual spells
Speaks
Unique
Archer
Spellcaster
Warm-blooded

Useful Info

Pan was a unique satyr who was never included in a stable release of Crawl. He was intended to roam the Enchanted Forest with a band of satyrs and fauns, disabling you with powerful Hexes while his allies riddled you with arrows and sling bullets.

Spells

Spell set
Slot1 none
Slot2 Mass Confusion
Slot3 none
Slot4 Metabolic Englaciation
Slot5 Sleep
Slot6 Blink

History

Pan was a unique that existed in trunk for a very brief period of time. He was originally intended to be included in 0.13, but was disabled shortly after his introduction, and removed not long thereafter.
